page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT LOCAL BUSINESSES
page.content: These are the local businesses in the area electrician,builders merchant, welder,plumber,joiner,ladies & gents hairdressers,garage which employs 7 & sells 20,000l of petrol per month,coal merchant employs 5 sells about 1000 bags of coal per week and delivers over a 25 mile radius.Shops include Mace with a post office counter,Bakers Hardware Store,sweet shop/Newsagent, Butcher,Spar,Cobbler/shoe shop,and Halifax Building Society. Grampian Regional council offices employs 16 manual workers and 6 staff. They have 3 lorries,4 vans,2 rollers 1 large roadsweeper,2 tractors,5 snow ploughs,2 gritters. The Fish Processing Factory is the biggest employer providing about 200 jobs.This firm meets with a lot of local opposition to smell and brie and have been refused planning permission.
